利用菲涅尔衍射公式计算高斯光束

利基模高斯光束、厄米-高斯光束和拉盖尔-高斯光束真空中任意传播距离z处的电场

一、数学准备

1.规定源平面变量：

ξ=ρcos⁡ϕ,η=ρsin⁡ϕ.\xi=\rho\cos{\phi},\eta=\rho\sin{\phi}.ξ=ρcosϕ,η=ρsinϕ.

2.规定参考平面变量：

x=rcos⁡φ,y=rsin⁡φ.x=r\cos{\varphi},y=r\sin{\varphi}.x=rcosφ,y=rsinφ.

3.菲涅耳衍射公式：

Uo(x,y)=exp(jkz)jλz∬−∞∞Ui(ξ,η)exp{jk2z[(ξ−x)2+(η−y)2]}dξdη,U_o (x,y )=\frac{exp (jkz )}{j\lambda z}\iint_{-\infty}^{\infty}{U_i (\xi,\eta )}exp \{\frac{jk}{2z} [ (\xi-x )^2+ (\eta-y )^2 ] \}d\xi d\eta,Uo​(x,y)=jλzexp(jkz)​∬−∞∞​Ui​(ξ,η)exp{2zjk​[(ξ−x)2+(η−y)2]}dξdη,
Uo(r,φ)=exp(jkz)jλz∫02π∫0∞Ui(ρ,ϕ)exp{jk2z[ρ2+r2−2ρrcos⁡(ϕ−φ)]}ρdρdϕ.U_o (r,\varphi )=\frac{exp (jkz )}{j\lambda z}\int_{0}^{2\pi}\int_{0}^{\infty}{U_i (\rho,\phi )}exp \{\frac{jk}{2z} [\rho^2+r^2-2\rho r\cos{ (\phi-\varphi )} ] \}\rho d\rho d\phi.Uo​(r,φ)=jλzexp(jkz)​∫02π​∫0∞​Ui​(ρ,ϕ)exp{2zjk​[ρ2+r2−2ρrcos(ϕ−φ)]}ρdρdϕ.

4.高斯光束参数：

z0=πW02λ=12kW02,z_0=\frac{\pi W_0^2}{\lambda}=\frac{1}{2}kW_0^2,z0​=λπW02​​=21​kW02​,

W(z)=W02[1+(λzπW02)]2=W0(1+z2z02)12,W(z)=W_0^2[1+(\frac{\lambda z}{\pi W_0^2})]^2=W_0(1+\frac{z^2}{z_0^2})^\frac{1}{2},W(z)=W02​[1+(πW02​λz​)]2=W0​(1+z02​z2​)21​,
R(z)=z(1+z02z2)=z02+z2z.R(z)=z(1+\frac{z_0^2}{z^2})=\frac{z_0^2+z^2}{z}.R(z)=z(1+z2z02​​)=zz02​+z2​.

5.必要的积分公式：

∫−∞∞exp(−ax2)dx=(πa)12,\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp(-ax^2)dx=(\frac{\pi}{a})^\frac{1}{2},∫−∞∞​exp(−ax2)dx=(aπ​)21​,

∫−∞∞exp[−(x−y)22u]Hm(x)dx=(2πu)12(1−2u)m2Hm[y(1−2u)−12],0≤u≤12,\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}{exp[-\frac{(x-y)^2}{2u}]H_m(x)dx}=(2\pi u)^\frac{1}{2}(1-2u)^\frac{m}{2}H_m[y(1-2u)^{-\frac{1}{2}}],0\le u\le\frac{1}{2},∫−∞∞​exp[−2u(x−y)2​]Hm​(x)dx=(2πu)21​(1−2u)2m​Hm​[y(1−2u)−21​],0≤u≤21​,

∫02πexp[−jxcos⁡(φ1−φ2)+jlφ1]dφ1\int_{0}^{2\pi}exp[-jx\cos{(\varphi_1-\varphi_2)}+jl\varphi_1]d\varphi_1∫02π​exp[−jxcos(φ1​−φ2​)+jlφ1​]dφ1​
=∑−∞∞∫02π(−j)mJm(x)exp[jm(φ1−φ2)]exp(jlφ1)dφ1=\sum_{-\infty}^{\infty}{\int_{0}^{2\pi}(-j)^mJ_m(x)exp[jm(\varphi_1-\varphi_2)]exp(jl\varphi_1)d\varphi_1}=∑−∞∞​∫02π​(−j)mJm​(x)exp[jm(φ1​−φ2​)]exp(jlφ1​)dφ1​
=2π(−j)lJl(x)exp(jlφ2).=2\pi(-j)^lJ_l(x)exp(jl\varphi_2).=2π(−j)lJl​(x)exp(jlφ2​).

∫0∞xl+1exp[−βx2]Lpl(αx2)Jl(xy)dx=2−l−1β−l−p−1(β−α)pylexp(−y24β)Lpl[y24β(α−β)].\int_{0}^{\infty}x^{l+1}exp[-\beta x^2]L_p^l(\alpha x^2)J_l(xy)dx=2^{-l-1}\beta^{-l-p-1}(\beta-\alpha)^py^lexp(-\frac{y^2}{4\beta})L_p^l[\frac{y^2}{4\beta(\alpha-\beta)}].∫0∞​xl+1exp[−βx2]Lpl​(αx2)Jl​(xy)dx=2−l−1β−l−p−1(β−α)pylexp(−4βy2​)Lpl​[4β(α−β)y2​].

6.一个重要定义：

1+jzz0=Rexp[jϕ(z)].1+j\frac{z}{z_0}=Rexp[j\phi(z)].1+jz0​z​=Rexp[jϕ(z)].

则：

R=[1+z2z02]12=W(z)W0,ϕ(z)=tan⁡zz0.R=[1+\frac{z^2}{z_0^2}]^\frac{1}{2}=\frac{W(z)}{W_0},\phi(z)=\tan{\frac{z}{z_0}}.R=[1+z02​z2​]21​=W0​W(z)​,ϕ(z)=tanz0​z​.

二、基模-高斯光束

源平面电场表达式：

Ui(ξ,η)=exp(−ξ2+η2W02).U_i(\xi,\eta)=exp(-\frac{\xi^2+\eta^2}{W_0^2}).Ui​(ξ,η)=exp(−W02​ξ2+η2​).

代入菲涅耳衍射公式：

Uo(x,y)=exp(jkz)jλz∬−∞∞exp(−ξ2+η2W02)exp{jk2z[(ξ−x)2+(η−y)2]}dξdηU_o(x,y)=\frac{exp(jkz)}{j\lambda z}\iint_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp(-\frac{\xi^2+\eta^2}{W_0^2})exp\{\frac{jk}{2z}[(\xi-x)^2+(\eta-y)^2]\}d\xi d\etaUo​(x,y)=jλzexp(jkz)​∬−∞∞​exp(−W02​ξ2+η2​)exp{2zjk​[(ξ−x)2+(η−y)2]}dξdη
=exp(jkz)jλz∬−∞∞exp[−ξ2W02+jk2z(ξ−x)2]exp[−η2W02+jk2z(η−y)2]dξdη=\frac{exp(jkz)}{j\lambda z}\iint_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp[-\frac{\xi^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\xi-x)^2]exp[-\frac{\eta^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\eta-y)^2]d\xi d\eta=jλzexp(jkz)​∬−∞∞​exp[−W02​ξ2​+2zjk​(ξ−x)2]exp[−W02​η2​+2zjk​(η−y)2]dξdη
=exp(jkz)jλz∫−∞∞exp[−ξ2W02+jk2z(ξ−x)2]dξ∫−∞∞exp[−η2W02+jk2z(η−y)2]dη.=\frac{exp(jkz)}{j\lambda z}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp[-\frac{\xi^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\xi-x)^2]d\xi\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp[-\frac{\eta^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\eta-y)^2]d\eta.=jλzexp(jkz)​∫−∞∞​exp[−W02​ξ2​+2zjk​(ξ−x)2]dξ∫−∞∞​exp[−W02​η2​+2zjk​(η−y)2]dη.

设：

A=exp(jkz)jλz,A=\frac{exp(jkz)}{j\lambda z},A=jλzexp(jkz)​,
Ix=∫−∞∞exp[−ξ2W02+jk2z(ξ−x)2]dξ,I_x=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp[-\frac{\xi^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\xi-x)^2]d\xi,Ix​=∫−∞∞​exp[−W02​ξ2​+2zjk​(ξ−x)2]dξ,
Iy=∫−∞∞exp[−η2W02+jk2z(η−y)2]dη.I_y=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp[-\frac{\eta^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\eta-y)^2]d\eta.Iy​=∫−∞∞​exp[−W02​η2​+2zjk​(η−y)2]dη.

则有：

Uo(x,y)=A⋅Ix⋅Iy.U_o(x,y)=A\cdot I_x\cdot I_y.Uo​(x,y)=A⋅Ix​⋅Iy​.

考虑I_x：

Ix=∫−∞∞exp[−ξ2W02+jk2z(ξ−x)2]dξI_x=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp[-\frac{\xi^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\xi-x)^2]d\xiIx​=∫−∞∞​exp[−W02​ξ2​+2zjk​(ξ−x)2]dξ
=∫−∞∞exp[−ξ2W02+jk2z(ξ2−2ξx+x2)]dξ=∫−∞∞exp[(−1W02+jk2z)(ξ2−2jk2z−1W02+jk2zξx+(jk2z−1W02+jk2z)2x2)+jk2zx2−(jk2z)2−1W02+jk2zx2]dξ=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp[-\frac{\xi^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\xi^2-2\xi x+x^2)]d\xi\\=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp[(-\frac{1}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z})(\xi^2-2\frac{\frac{jk}{2z}}{-\frac{1}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}}\xi x+(\frac{\frac{jk}{2z}}{-\frac{1}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}})^2x^2)+\frac{jk}{2z}x^2-\frac{(\frac{jk}{2z})^2}{-\frac{1}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}}x^2]d\xi=∫−∞∞​exp[−W02​ξ2​+2zjk​(ξ2−2ξx+x2)]dξ=∫−∞∞​exp[(−W02​1​+2zjk​)(ξ2−2−W02​1​+2zjk​2zjk​​ξx+(−W02​1​+2zjk​2zjk​​)2x2)+2zjk​x2−−W02​1​+2zjk​(2zjk​)2​x2]dξ
=∫−∞∞exp[(−1W02+jk2z)(ξ−jk2z−1W02+jk2zx)2+jk2z(1−jk2z−1W02+jk2z)x2]dξ=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp[(-\frac{1}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z})(\xi-\frac{\frac{jk}{2z}}{-\frac{1}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}}x)^2+\frac{jk}{2z}(1-\frac{\frac{jk}{2z}}{-\frac{1}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}})x^2]d\xi=∫−∞∞​exp[(−W02​1​+2zjk​)(ξ−−W02​1​+2zjk​2zjk​​x)2+2zjk​(1−−W02​1​+2zjk​2zjk​​)x2]dξ
=exp[jk2z1W021W02−jk2zx2]∫−∞∞exp[−(1W02−jk2z)(ξ−jk2z−1W02+jk2zx)2]dξ. =exp[\frac{jk}{2z}\frac{\frac{1}{W_0^2}}{\frac{1}{W_0^2}-\frac{jk}{2z}}x^2]\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}{exp[-(\frac{1}{W_0^2}-\frac{jk}{2z})(\xi-\frac{\frac{jk}{2z}}{-\frac{1}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}}x)^2]d\xi.} =exp[2zjk​W02​1​−2zjk​W02​1​​x2]∫−∞∞​exp[−(W02​1​−2zjk​)(ξ−−W02​1​+2zjk​2zjk​​x)2]dξ. 

设：

a=1W02−jk2z,a=\frac{1}{W_0^2}-\frac{jk}{2z},a=W02​1​−2zjk​,

b=jk2z1W021W02−jk2zx2=jk2z11−jk2zW02x2=jk2z11−jz0zx2=jk2z(1+jz0z)(1−jz0z)(1+jz0z)x2b=\frac{jk}{2z}\frac{\frac{1}{W_0^2}}{\frac{1}{W_0^2}-\frac{jk}{2z}}x^2=\frac{jk}{2z}\frac{1}{1-\frac{jk}{2z}W_0^2}x^2=\frac{jk}{2z}\frac{1}{1-j\frac{z_0}{z}}x^2=\frac{jk}{2z}\frac{(1+j\frac{z_0}{z})}{(1-j\frac{z_0}{z})(1+j\frac{z_0}{z})}x^2b=2zjk​W02​1​−2zjk​W02​1​​x2=2zjk​1−2zjk​W02​1​x2=2zjk​1−jzz0​​1​x2=2zjk​(1−jzz0​​)(1+jzz0​​)(1+jzz0​​)​x2
=jk2z(1+jz0z)1+z02z2x2=jk2(z+jz0)z2+z02x2=jk2zz2+z02x2−k2z0z2+z02x2=\frac{jk}{2z}\frac{(1+j\frac{z_0}{z})}{1+\frac{z_0^2}{z^2}}x^2=\frac{jk}{2}\frac{(z+jz_0)}{z^2+z_0^2}x^2=\frac{jk}{2}\frac{z}{z^2+z_0^2}x^2-\frac{k}{2}\frac{z_0}{z^2+z_0^2}x^2=2zjk​1+z2z02​​(1+jzz0​​)​x2=2jk​z2+z02​(z+jz0​)​x2=2jk​z2+z02​z​x2−2k​z2+z02​z0​​x2
=jk2R(z)x2−122z0W02z0z2+z02x2=jkx22R(z)−x2W2(z),=\frac{jk}{2R(z)}x^2-\frac{1}{2}\frac{2z_0}{W_0^2}\frac{z_0}{z^2+z_0^2}x^2=\frac{jkx^2}{2R(z)}-\frac{x^2}{W^2(z)},=2R(z)jk​x2−21​W02​2z0​​z2+z02​z0​​x2=2R(z)jkx2​−W2(z)x2​,

t=ξ−jk2z−1W02+jk2zx.t=\xi-\frac{\frac{jk}{2z}}{-\frac{1}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}}x.t=ξ−−W02​1​+2zjk​2zjk​​x.

得：

Ix=exp(b)∫−∞∞exp(−at2)dt.I_x=exp(b)\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp(-at^2)dt.Ix​=exp(b)∫−∞∞​exp(−at2)dt.

利用积分公式：

∫−∞∞exp(−ax2)dx=(πa)12.\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}exp(-ax^2)dx=(\frac{\pi}{a})^\frac{1}{2}.∫−∞∞​exp(−ax2)dx=(aπ​)21​.

得：

Ix=exp(b)(πa)12.I_x=exp(b)(\frac{\pi}{a})^\frac{1}{2}.Ix​=exp(b)(aπ​)21​.

其中：

1a=11W02−jk2z=11W02−j2z2z0W02=W021−jz0z=jW02j+z0z=jW02zz0jzz0+1\frac{1}{a}=\frac{1}{\frac{1}{W_0^2}-\frac{jk}{2z}}=\frac{1}{\frac{1}{W_0^2}-\frac{j}{2z}\frac{2z_0}{W_0^2}}=\frac{W_0^2}{1-j\frac{z_0}{z}}=j\frac{W_0^2}{j+\frac{z_0}{z}}=j\frac{W_0^2\frac{z}{z_0}}{j\frac{z}{z_0}+1}a1​=W02​1​−2zjk​1​=W02​1​−2zj​W02​2z0​​1​=1−jzz0​​W02​​=jj+zz0​​W02​​=jjz0​z​+1W02​z0​z​​
=jW02zz0z0[z02+z2]12exp[−jϕ(z)]=jW_0^2\frac{z}{z_0}\frac{z_0}{[z_0^2+z^2]^\frac{1}{2}}exp[-j\phi(z)] =jW02​z0​z​[z02​+z2]21​z0​​exp[−jϕ(z)]
=j2z0kzz0z0[z02+z2]12exp[−jϕ(z)]=j\frac{2z_0}{k}\frac{z}{z_0}\frac{z_0}{[z_0^2+z^2]^\frac{1}{2}}exp[-j\phi(z)]=jk2z0​​z0​z​[z02​+z2]21​z0​​exp[−jϕ(z)]
=j2zkW0W(z)exp[−jϕ(z)],=j\frac{2z}{k}\frac{W_0}{W(z)}exp[-j\phi(z)],=jk2z​W(z)W0​​exp[−jϕ(z)],

[πa]12=[jπ2zkW0W(z)exp[−jϕ(z)]]12=[jλzW0W(z)exp[−jϕ(z)]]12.[\frac{\pi}{a}]^\frac{1}{2}=[j\pi\frac{2z}{k}\frac{W_0}{W(z)}exp[-j\phi(z)]]^\frac{1}{2}=[j\lambda z\frac{W_0}{W(z)}exp[-j\phi(z)]]^\frac{1}{2}.[aπ​]21​=[jπk2z​W(z)W0​​exp[−jϕ(z)]]21​=[jλzW(z)W0​​exp[−jϕ(z)]]21​.

则：

Ix=exp[jkx22R(z)−x2W2(z)]⋅[jλzW0W(z)exp[−jϕ(z)]]12.I_x=exp[\frac{jkx^2}{2R(z)}-\frac{x^2}{W^2(z)}]\cdot[j\lambda z\frac{W_0}{W(z)}exp[-j\phi(z)]]^\frac{1}{2}.Ix​=exp[2R(z)jkx2​−W2(z)x2​]⋅[jλzW(z)W0​​exp[−jϕ(z)]]21​.

同理可得：

Iy=exp[jky22R(z)−y2W2(z)]⋅[jλzW0W(z)exp[−jϕ(z)]]12.I_y=exp[\frac{jky^2}{2R(z)}-\frac{y^2}{W^2(z)}]\cdot[j\lambda z\frac{W_0}{W(z)}exp[-j\phi(z)]]^\frac{1}{2}.Iy​=exp[2R(z)jky2​−W2(z)y2​]⋅[jλzW(z)W0​​exp[−jϕ(z)]]21​.

综上可得：

Uo(x,y)=A⋅Ix⋅IyU_o(x,y)=A\cdot I_x\cdot I_yUo​(x,y)=A⋅Ix​⋅Iy​

=exp(jkz)jλzexp[jkx22R(z)−x2W2(z)][jλzW0W(z)exp[−jϕ(z)]]12⋅exp[jky22R(z)−y2W2(z)][jλzW0W(z)exp[−jϕ(z)]]12=\frac{exp(jkz)}{j\lambda z}exp[\frac{jkx^2}{2R(z)}-\frac{x^2}{W^2(z)}][j\lambda z\frac{W_0}{W(z)}exp[-j\phi(z)]]^\frac{1}{2}\cdot exp[\frac{jky^2}{2R(z)}-\frac{y^2}{W^2(z)}][j\lambda z\frac{W_0}{W(z)}exp[-j\phi(z)]]^\frac{1}{2}=jλzexp(jkz)​exp[2R(z)jkx2​−W2(z)x2​][jλzW(z)W0​​exp[−jϕ(z)]]21​⋅exp[2R(z)jky2​−W2(z)y2​][jλzW(z)W0​​exp[−jϕ(z)]]21​
=exp(jkz)jλzjλzW0W(z)exp[−jϕ(z)]exp[jk(x2+y2)2R(z)−(x2+y2)W2(z)]=\frac{exp(jkz)}{j\lambda z}j\lambda z\frac{W_0}{W(z)}exp[-j\phi(z)]exp[\frac{jk(x^2+y^2)}{2R(z)}-\frac{(x^2+y^2)}{W^2(z)}]=jλzexp(jkz)​jλzW(z)W0​​exp[−jϕ(z)]exp[2R(z)jk(x2+y2)​−W2(z)(x2+y2)​]
=W0W(z)exp[−r2W2(z)]exp{j(kz−ϕ(z)+kr22R(z))}.=\frac{W_0}{W(z)}exp[-\frac{r^2}{W^2(z)}]exp\{j(kz-\phi(z)+\frac{kr^2}{2R(z)})\}.=W(z)W0​​exp[−W2(z)r2​]exp{j(kz−ϕ(z)+2R(z)kr2​)}.

三、厄米-高斯光束

源平面电场表达式：

Ui(ξ,η)=Hm(2ξW0)Hn(2ηW0)exp(−ξ2+η2W02).U_i(\xi,\eta)=H_m(\frac{\sqrt2\xi}{W_0})H_n(\frac{\sqrt2\eta}{W_0})exp(-\frac{\xi^2+\eta^2}{W_0^2}).Ui​(ξ,η)=Hm​(W0​2​ξ​)Hn​(W0​2​η​)exp(−W02​ξ2+η2​).

代入菲涅耳衍射公式：

Uo(x,y)=exp(jkz)jλz∬−∞∞Hm(2ξW0)Hn(2ηW0)exp(−ξ2+η2W02)⋅exp{jk2z[(ξ−x)2+(η−y)2]}dξdηU_o(x,y)=\frac{exp(jkz)}{j\lambda z}\iint_{-\infty}^{\infty}{H_m(\frac{\sqrt2\xi}{W_0})H_n(\frac{\sqrt2\eta}{W_0})exp(-\frac{\xi^2+\eta^2}{W_0^2})}\cdot exp\{\frac{jk}{2z}[(\xi-x)^2+(\eta-y)^2]\}d\xi d\etaUo​(x,y)=jλzexp(jkz)​∬−∞∞​Hm​(W0​2​ξ​)Hn​(W0​2​η​)exp(−W02​ξ2+η2​)⋅exp{2zjk​[(ξ−x)2+(η−y)2]}dξdη

=exp(jkz)jλz∫−∞∞Hm(2ξW0)exp[−ξ2W02+jk2z(ξ−x)2]dξ⋅∫−∞∞Hn(2ηW0)exp[−η2W02+jk2z(η−y)2]dη.=\frac{exp(jkz)}{j\lambda z}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}{H_m(\frac{\sqrt2\xi}{W_0})exp[-\frac{\xi^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\xi-x)^2]d\xi}\cdot\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}{H_n(\frac{\sqrt2\eta}{W_0})exp[-\frac{\eta^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\eta-y)^2]d\eta}.=jλzexp(jkz)​∫−∞∞​Hm​(W0​2​ξ​)exp[−W02​ξ2​+2zjk​(ξ−x)2]dξ⋅∫−∞∞​Hn​(W0​2​η​)exp[−W02​η2​+2zjk​(η−y)2]dη.

设：

A=exp(jkz)jλz,A=\frac{exp(jkz)}{j\lambda z},A=jλzexp(jkz)​,

Ix=∫−∞∞Hm(2ξW0)exp[−ξ2W02+jk2z(ξ−x)2]dξ,I_x=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}{H_m(\frac{\sqrt2\xi}{W_0})exp[-\frac{\xi^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\xi-x)^2]d\xi},Ix​=∫−∞∞​Hm​(W0​2​ξ​)exp[−W02​ξ2​+2zjk​(ξ−x)2]dξ,
Iy=∫−∞∞Hn(2ηW0)exp[−η2W02+jk2z(η−y)2]dη.I_y=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}{H_n(\frac{\sqrt2\eta}{W_0})exp[-\frac{\eta^2}{W_0^2}+\frac{jk}{2z}(\eta-y)^2]d\eta}.Iy​=∫−∞∞​Hn​(W0​2​η​)exp[−W02​η2​+2zjk​(η−y)2]dη.

则有：

Uo(x,y)=A⋅Ix⋅Iy.U_o(x,y)=A\cdot I_x\cdot I_y.Uo​(x,y)=A⋅Ix​⋅Iy​.

考虑I_x：
